definitions.definition: ( chiefly historical ) A tax , tariff or duty that is imposed , especially on merchandise.
( horse racing , slang ) The weight that must be carried by a horse in a race ; the handicap .

main_definition: ( chiefly historical ) A tax , tariff or duty that is imposed , especially on merchandise.
secondary_definitions: ( horse racing , slang ) The weight that must be carried by a horse in a race ; the handicap .

definitions.definition: The top part of a column , pillar , pier , wall , etc. that supports an arch .

main_definition: ( architecture ) The top part of a column , pillar , pier , wall , etc. that supports an arch .
